name: rabbit-rr
description: Simple rabbitmq client for use with REQ/REP pattern

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha $(find test -name '*.test.js') --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js || true && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Jarrett Cruger <jcrugzz@gmail.com>
